Interface CookieDecoder

All Superinterfaces:
Ordered
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeCookieDecoder, DefaultCookieDecoder, NettyCookieDecoder
public interface CookieDecoder extends Ordered
Interface to allow cookie decoding.

4.0.0
Author:
